plugin-data.name: Hosting space detector
plugin-data.description: this plugin send info to admin when use too much size

paypal: If you want support my work  via paypal :) Thanks!
placeholdermb: enter how many megabytes without the letters MB
info: inform the administrator when the website exceeds the limit of (MB):
spaceover: E-mail for notification when space is over
out-of-space: You are running out of space, please free up some space
subject: Storage Alert!
